stamps.name: makeCreature
getNextLink
renderCreature
setup
stamps.code:
createCanvas(400,400)
background(255);

firstCreature =  makeCreature(20, .2, renderBasicLink)

secondCreature =  makeCreature(15, .1, renderRoundedLink)

thirdCreature =  makeCreature(20, .05, renderReversedLink)


noStroke()

stamps.name: renderBasicLink
stamps.args: x = mouseX, y = mouseY, position = mouseX/width

stamps.name: renderRoundedLink
stamps.args: x = mouseX, y = mouseY, position = mouseX/width

stamps.name: renderReversedLink
stamps.args: x = mouseX, y = mouseY, position = mouseX/width
